extracted_playbook.title: Implement Data Recovery Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain and retain multiple copies of sensitive or proprietary data and servers in a physically separate, segmented, and secure location.

extracted_playbook.title: Network Segmentation and Offline Backups
extracted_playbook.description: Implement network segmentation and maintain offline backups of data to ensure limited interruption to the organization.

extracted_playbook.title: Regular Data Backup and Protection
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly back up data and password protect backup copies stored offline. Ensure copies of critical data are not accessible for modification or deletion from the system where the data resides.

extracted_playbook.title: Install and Update Antivirus Software
extracted_playbook.description: Install, regularly update, and enable real-time detection for antivirus software on all hosts.

extracted_playbook.title: Install System Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Install updates for operating systems, software, and firmware as soon as possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Review for Unrecognized Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Review domain controllers, servers, workstations, and active directories for new and/or unrecognized accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit Administrative User Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Audit user accounts with administrative privileges and configure access controls according to the principle of least privilege.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable unused ports to reduce potential attack vectors.

extracted_playbook.title: Add Email Banner for External Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Consider adding an email banner to emails received from outside your organization.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Hyperlinks in Emails
extracted_playbook.description: Disable hyperlinks in received emails to prevent phishing attacks.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Multifactor Authentication (MFA)
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce multifactor authentication to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Develop Password Policies Using NIST Standards
extracted_playbook.description: Use NIST standards for developing and managing password policies, including using longer passwords, storing passwords in hashed format, adding password user 'salts', avoiding password reuse, implementing account lockouts, and disabling password hints.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Administrator Credentials for Software Installation
extracted_playbook.description: Require administrator credentials to install software to prevent unauthorized installations.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Only use secure networks and avoid using public Wi-Fi networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Install and Use VPN
extracted_playbook.description: Consider installing and using a virtual private network (VPN) to establish secure remote connections.

extracted_playbook.title: Focus on Cybersecurity Awareness and Training
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly provide users with training on information security principles and techniques as well as overall emerging cybersecurity risks and vulnerabilities, such as ransomware and phishing scams.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Longer Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Use longer passwords consisting of at least 8 characters and no more than 64 characters in length.

extracted_playbook.title: Store Passwords in Hashed Format
extracted_playbook.description: Store passwords in hashed format using industry-recognized password managers.

extracted_playbook.title: Add Password User 'Salts'
extracted_playbook.description: Add password user 'salts' to shared login credentials to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Password Reuse
extracted_playbook.description: Avoid reusing passwords to prevent security breaches.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Account Lockouts for Failed Login Attempts
extracted_playbook.description: Implement multiple failed login attempt account lockouts to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Password Hints
extracted_playbook.description: Disable password hints to prevent attackers from gaining clues about passwords.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is there evidence of password compromise?

extracted_playbook.title: Change Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Refrain from requiring password changes unless there is evidence of password compromise.
